newsitem.title: TURKEY: Two pilots die in Turkish military plane crash.
newsitem.headline: Two pilots die in Turkish military plane crash.

text.p: Two Turkish pilots died when a light military aircraft crashed during a training flight in western Turkey on Thursday, the state-run Anatolian news agency said.
The aircraft crashed about 100 km (60 miles) northeast of the Cigli airbase in the main western port town of Izmir, from where it had taken off, Anatolian said. It gave no further details.
